name: bj-elequ12
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3))))

comment: An identity law for the non-logical predicate, which combines ~ elequ1 and ~ elequ2 . For the analogous theorems for class terms, see ~ eleq1 , ~ eleq2 and ~ eleq12 . (TODO: move to main part.) (Contributed by BJ, 29-Sep-2019.)
